title: Resolve Guest Seating Issue
description: A guest at a basketball game reports that someone else is sitting in their assigned seats.

tasks.description: Ask the guest to see their ticket to verify their correct seat location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the guest is in the correct section and has a valid ticket for the seats in question.

tasks.description: Dispatch an usher or guest services staff member to the location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully dispatches the nearest staff member to the guest's location.

tasks.description: Instruct the staff member to check the tickets of the other party and resolve the dispute or re-seat the original ticket holder if necessary.
tasks.expected_outcome: The staff member resolves the issue on-site, and the agent logs the incident as resolved.
